welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kulpsville, the charming and historic city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to indulge in our cultural offerings and explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and corporate flights, providing exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at North Philadelphia Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
